{{Wireless embedded system |brand=KAONMEDIA |model=CG2001 |revision=-AN22CC |fcc_date=06/08/2017 |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |fcc_id=WQT-CG2001-AN22CC |pwr_v=12 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3383 |fla1=16 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43227 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, FXS, |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} :{{ProductPage|http://www.kaonmedia.com/eng/product/pro02_3.asp?pgrp=41&pidx=58}}
"BCM3383_REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
DOCSIS 3.0 (8x4)<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }} â€¢ Branded by [https://www.claro.cr Claro]
The DFS Test Report document at the FCC lists many :"Variant Models" which are electrically identical: * CG2001 * CG2001-AN2NB, CG2001-AN2NC * CG2001-AN21B, CG2001-AN21C * CG2001-AN22B, CG2001-AN22C * CG2001-LN21B, CG2001-LN22B * CG2001-LN2NB, CG2001-SN2NB * CG2001-SN21B, CG2001-SN22B * CG2001-UN2NB, CG2001-UN2NC * CG2001-UN21B, CG2001-UN21C * CG2001-UN22B, CG2001-UN22C
